column1: Full ball, on off stump, Taylor gets well forward and defends to off side
Full ball, on off stump, defended to off side
good length ball, just outside off, angles it to third man for a single
full ball, on off stump, drives to wide of mid-off for a quick single
back of length, on target, comes forward and defended to cover
full ball, on off stump, shapes away a bit, Chibhabha tries to defend, thick inside edge onto pad
good length ball, just outside off and moves away, gets the edge down to third man for a single
Rauf strikes! Good length ball, just outside off and shapes away, tries to push at it, gets the edge in the safe hands of Rizwan behind the stumps
short in length, angles it down to third man for a single
Full ball, on off stump, goes for the drive, gets the thick outside edge and races away in the gap to deep cover fence for four
good short ball, ducks underneath it
on middle and leg stump, worked away to leg side for a single
Short in length, outside off, goes for the cut, thick outside edge over slips and one bounce over the fence
again short and wide outside off, another cut and good diving save by Shah at covers
Another short ball, Williams picks up the length early and pulls it away to deep midwicket fence for four
full on middle and leg stump, flicks it away to midwicket for a quick single
Shot! Full ball, on off stump, leans well forward, drives with full face of the bat, up and over mid-off fielder for four
Short and wide outside off, Williams just uses the pace of the ball and guides it down to third man fence for four
full ball, pitches outside leg, swings back into the left hander, hits the pad to short fine leg, runs a legbye
Haris strikes again! Good short ball with some pace, Chibhabha goes for the pull shot, too quick for him, hits high on the bat and chips a simple catch at short midwicket, Faheem takes a simple catch
another good delivery, full just outside off and moves away, tries to drive, thick outside edge and no 2nd slip was in place, raced away to third man fence for four
short in length, on middle and leg stump, tucked away to leg side
good length ball, on off stump, taps it to off side for a quick single
full ball, on off stump, defends it to off side for a quick single
lovely delivery, full just outside off and moves away, goes for the drive and gets beaten
full ball, on off stump, pushes to mid-off for a quick single
full ball, on off stump, drives well but straight to mid-off fielder
Played on! Full ball, on off stump, Williams tries defend, ball gets the inside edge of the bat and goes onto disturb the stumps
back of length, on off stump, defended to cover
good length ball, on off stump, defended on the front foot
Good length ball, just outside of and nips back a bit, tries to drive on the up, thick inside edge, beats the stumps and the short fine leg fielder for four
back of length, goes back and defends to off side with soft hands for a quick single
good length ball, on off stump, angles it down to third man for a single
full ball, on off stump, drives to mid-off
good length ball, just outside off, drives on the up to cover for a single
good length ball, just outside off, drives with open face of the bat and races away to backward point fence for four
on middle and leg stump, flicked away down to fine leg for a single
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, pushes to mid-on for a quick single
good length ball, on leg stump, flicked away down to fine leg for a single
short and wide and called a wide
full ball, on off stump, pushes to mid-off
good length ball, just outside off, slower in pace, goes for the pull and misses it through to keeper
Long hop, Madhevere goes deep in the crease and pulls it away over deep midwicket fence for a six
tossed up, on off stump, tried to drive, thick inside edge onto pad
looks very close, tossed up, just outside off and hits the pad looks in line, big shout for lbw, turned down by umpire, replay shows that it was hitting leg, no review was taken by Pakistan
tossed up, on off stump, pushed to cover
tossed up, on off stump, tried to drive, thick inside edge onto pad
again tossed up, on off stump, defended on the front foot
short in length, down the leg side through to keeper for a wide
short in length, outside off, punches it to point
Shot! Short and wide outside off, goes back and cuts it away to deep cover fence for four
short in length, on off stump, angles it to gully for a single
good length ball, on off stump, gets well forward and defends to off side
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
good length ball, just outside off and moves away, tries to push at it and misses it
tossed up, on off stump, defended to gully
Wrong one, on off stump, goes through the defense and hits the stumps
tossed up, on off stump, driven down the ground to long-off

tossed up, wrong one, went for the sweep and took it on the pad, loud shout for lbw, up goes the finger of umpire, review has been taken and replay shows that nothing on the bat and was hitting middle stump
tossed up, on off stump, defended back to bowler
again googly, hits the pad and missing leg
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to deep cover for a single
back of length, tries to defend, inside edge onto pad and just missed the stumps, ran a quick single
good length ball, on leg stump, turned to midwicket for a single
short in length, goes for the pull and misses it through to keeper
again good length ball, just outside off, goes for the cut and misses again
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, defended to leg side for a quick single
tossed up, on off stump, tried to defend, thick outside edge to gully
low full toss, driven in the air and deep midwicket fielder running in, dive forward but well short of fielder
short in length, outside off, cuts away to deep point
tossed up, on off stump, tried to defend, edged it to gully
short in length, just outside off, punches to point
on middle and leg stump, turned away down to fine leg for a single
back of length, on off stump, goes back and pushes to mid-off
back of length, punches to point for a quick single
full ball, on off stump, angles it to gully for a single
full ball, on off stump, pushed to mid-off for a single
short ball, on middle and leg stump, pulls to deep square leg
tossed up, on off stump, turned away with the spin to leg side for a single
Shot! Tossed up, on off stump, driven down the ground up and over long-on fence for a six
Tossed up, on leg stump, went for the sweep, inner edge and raced away down to fine leg fence for four
googly, pitches on middle stump and goes down the leg side through to keeper
Lovely delivery, well tossed up, Chigumbura came down the wicket, beaten in the flight and ball turned away sharply, Rizwan did the rest behind the stumps
good length ball, on off stump, defended back to bowler
again back of length, on middle and leg stump, defended to mid-on
short in length, outside off, cuts in the air just wide of diving point fielder for couple of runs
short ball, well over batsman head and called a wide
good length ball, comes down the wicket and pushes to mid-off for a single
on middle and leg stump, tucked away to deep square leg for a single
short in length, punches away to deep cover
good length ball, on target, defended back to bowler
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to point for a single
short in length, on leg stump, turned away to deep square leg
short ball, on off stump, angles it down to third man for a single
short in length, outside off, angles it down to third man for a single
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, turned away to deep midwicket for couple of runs
short in length, outside off, cuts away hard to deep point, lovely sliding save by fielder, saved a run
full ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to deep square leg for a single
short ball, defends it with one hand off the bat to gully for a single
full ball, on middle stump, pushes to mid-on for a quick single
full ball, on middle and leg stump, flicked away to deep midwicket and came back for the 2nd run
back of length, on off stump, angles it down to third man for a single
full on middle stump, turned away to deep midwicket
Dropped! good length ball, tries to play a big shot, goes in the air and Faheem at mid-off running in, dives forward but fails to hold the catch
Shot! Full ball, on off stump, drives hard down the ground and beats the mid-off fielder for four
short in length, another mistimed pull landed safely to leg side
short in length, outside off, slices it down to third man for a single
good length ball, outside off, drives and misses
full ball, on target, comes forward and defends it back to bowler
Gone! Good length ball, comes down the wicket and hits it hard straight at the throat of Fakhar at extra cover who takes a sharp catch
full ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
slowr yorker just misses the off stump through to keeper
Shot! Full ball, on off stump, drives up and over mid-off fielder for four
full ball, just outside off, plays and misses
again fuller in length, just outside off and moves away, goes for the drive and gets beaten
short in length, on leg stump, pulls it down to fine leg for a single
slower ball, on off stump, lofted drive well short of long-on fielder
full ball, on off stump, pushes to mid-off for a quick single
Bang! What a superb shot to finish the innings! Good length ball, on middle and leg stump, Burl heaves it away away and connects it well over deep midwicket fence for a six
good length ball, pitches on middle stump and angling across the left hander, lets it go through to keeper
short and wide outside off, punches to cover
good length ball, just outside off, drives hard and cover fielder misfielded cost couple of runs
short in length, comes down the wicket, pulls it and keeps it down to short fine leg
good length ball, just outside off, punches to cover
full ball, on off stump, pushes down the ground to mid-off for a single
full ball, on off stump, comes forward and pushes to off side
good length ball, pitches on leg stump, hits the pad and missing leg stump
short in length, outside off, pushes to point for a single
full ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket for a single
good length ball, outside off, cuts it down to third man for a single
Shot! Full ball on middle and leg stump, clipped away off his pad to deep midwicket fence for four
Gone! Full ball, on middle stump, Fakhar chips a simple catch in the hands of Chigumbura at mid-on for a simple catch
full ball, on off stump, comes forward and pushes to mid-on
short in length, stands tall and defends to off side
Cracking shot! Good length ball, on middle and leg stump, picks up and deposits it over deep midwicket fence for a six
short in length, on leg stump, off the thigh to short fine leg for a legbye
short in length, turned away to leg side for a single
on middle and leg stump, whipped away to deep square leg
full ball, on off stump, defended to cover
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, pulls it away to deep midwicket
Poor fielding! Full ball, on middle stump, drives it down the ground and it goes through mid-off and mid-on fielders both were looking at each other
good length ball, punches down the ground to mid-on
on middle and leg stump, worked away to leg side for a single
Shot! slightly short in length, outside off, cuts it away and no chance for the third man fielder to stop that one
good length ball, just outside off, drives on the up but straight to cover fielder
good length ball, on target, gets right behind it and defends to mid-off
back of length, on off stump, pushes to point
short in length, on middle and leg stump, tucked away to leg side
Poor delivery, short in length, on leg stump, Babar flicks it away to beat the short fine leg fielder for four
full on middle and leg stump, pushes to long-on for a single
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to mid-off for a single
slower ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
Good length ball, outside off, Haider tries to play a pull shot, gets a top edge over short third man fielder for four
That is a cracking shot! Short in length, stands tall and punches it away to deep point fence for four more
good length ball, goes back and across and punches to cover
tossed up, on off stump, driven down the ground to long-off
tossed up, on off stump, turned to deep midwicket
Shot! Tossed up, came down the wicket and driven down the ground and even long-on fielder fails to stop that one
short in length, went back and mistimed cut to off side
arm ball, on off stump, pushes to long-on
on middle and leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on
arm ball, outside off, goes for the cut and misses it
Fantastic shot! Tossed up, came down the wicket and lofted it high and handsome over long-on fence for a six
short in length on off stump, punches to extra cover, misfielded cost couple of runs
short in length, on off stump, punches to cover
arm ball, on leg stump, flicks it away in the gap to deep midwicket for couple more
on middle and leg stump, pushed to long-on
short in length, outside off, cuts to off side
tossed up, well down the leg side for a wide
short in length, on leg stump, pulls to leg side
tossed up, on off stump, pushed back to bowler
short in length, on leg stump, pulls to midwicket
Short in length, just outside off, leans back and cuts it away down to third mjan fence for four
on middle and leg stump, turned to leg side
arm ball, outside offf, cuts and misses
again short in length, outside off, cuts to gully
again short and wide outside off, tries to cut, bottom edge down to third man fence for four
tossed up, on middle stump, driven down the ground to long-on
tossed up, came down the wicket and driven to deep cover
on middle and leg stump, turned to deep midwicket
tossed up, on off stump, driven to long-off
Shot! Tossed up, outside off, driven to extra cover and it went through the hands of skipper for four
Short in length, Babar goes deep in the crease and pulls it away over deep midwicket fence for a six
short in length, outside off, punches to cover
tossed up, on off stump, pushed to cover
faster ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to deep midwicket
short in length, outside off, pushes to off side for a single
Bang! Tossed up, outside off, went inside out and hit it over extra cover fence for a six
tossed up, on middle and leg stump, pushed to long-on
arm ball, on off stump, pushes to deep cover for a single
on middle and leg stump, turned to leg side
short in length, on leg stump, whips it away to backward square leg fence for four
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
Back to back fifty for Babar! Short in length, outside off, plays it late and angles it down to third man fence for his fifty
Excellnt catch by Chigumbura. Short in length, goes for the pull, gets the top edge and he slices at fine leg just inside the rope and takes a lovely catch
short and wide well outside off, left alone and called a wide
full ball, outside off and angling across, lets it go
again short in length, outside off and another leave by Shah
good length ball, just outside off, angles it down to third man
full ball, on leg stump, pushes to mid-on
full ball, on middle stump, Shah flicks it away down to fine leg fence for four
full ball, on off stump, pushes to cover for a single
again good length ball, just outside off, angles it down to third man
full ball, on middle and leg stump, pushes to mid-on for a risky single, throw misses the stumps at bowling end and Shah remains save, could have been out had that ball hit the stumps
lovely delivery, pitches on middle stump and swings away, Shah beaten outside off
short in length, stands tall and pushes to off side for a single
Superb shot! Full ball, on middle and leg stump, Haider drives up and over and bounces just inside the rope over midwicket
This time pitches short in length, Haider pulls and keeps it down and finds the gap at long leg fence for four
slower ball, well down the leg side through to keeper for a wide
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, whips it away to deep midwicket for couple of runs
Slower ball, goes for the big shot, goes high in the air over mid-on for couple more
Shaha finishes it in style! Short ball, pulls it away to deep midwicket fence for four
